MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA3 postcode area of Kilmarnock, affecting properties in Waterside and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:00pm due to a broken stay wire and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:29pm on Wednesday, 02 December 2020
